products.title: 01. la lagartija
products.description:
Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for
the start of your journey! It will provide your a rich
delicious flavor

products.title: 02. el tigre
products.description:
Realy dark coffee, only for real gourmets. It has
bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a littel
bit of peanuts with with caramel

products.title: 03. la cucaracha
products.description:
Sweat and intense with a big amount of different
flavors. Caramel, grapes, strawberry, you name it! It,s
great choice for warm summer days
